item.title: BREAKERS: Unlock the World title changed to LIMIT ZERO BREAKERS, launches in 2026 worldwide
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone

Playable at Tokyo Game Show 2025.

Anime-style action RPG LIMIT ZERO BREAKERS, formerly BREAKERS: Unlock the World, will launch for PC via Steam and PURPLE, iOS, and Android in 2026 worldwide, publisher NCSOFT and developer Vic Game Studios announced.

The game will also exhibit at Tokyo Game Show 2025, which will run from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan with a demo booth featuring a playable work-in-progress version of the game.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Explore the shattered floating islands of Seraphia as a Breaker in this anime-style real-time action RPG. Build a team of characters with different fighting styles and unleash stylish attacks as you battle through ancient dungeons and massive monsters in search of the Library of the Gods.

Key Features

  • Live an Anime-Inspired Adventure – Step into a playable anime, where every frame is filled with emotion and energy. A real-time action RPG with anime aesthetics and thrilling boss hunts at its core.
  • Unleash Stylish Combat – Time your dodges. Nail your parries. Land crushing counterattacks. Activate Break Mode to trigger cinematic finishers and turn every fight into a personal triumph. Your rhythm. Your action.
  • Ignite Elemental Chaos – Trigger relentless, explosive elemental reactions in battle with no limits on combinations. Combine opposing or harmonizing elements to create powerful skill chains.
  • Join the Raid – Team up with two other players in thrilling 3-player boss raids. Combine your powers to take down colossal enemies and uncover the secrets hidden deep within Seraphia.
  • The Legendary Quest – Each Breaker boards the Weaverwhale in search of their own wish. Journey across floating ruins and forgotten realms, chasing the legends said to grant any desire.
  • Where Every Wish Begins—The Journey to Seraphia – In a world shaped by gods and ruled by angels, legends speak of the “Archives of the Gods”—a vault said to grant any wish. A Breaker girl aboard the airship Weaverwhale encounters a boy with no memory. Their story unfolds through cinematic cutscenes and emotional arcs.

Watch a new set of trailers below. Visit the official website here.

Tokyo Game Show 2025 Teaser Trailer

item.title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter adds Switch 2 version; ‘Prologue’ demo now available for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Opening movie released.

Falcom will release a Switch 2 version of Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter alongside its previously announced versions, and a “Prologue” demo is available now for PlayStation 5, Switch (Japan-only for now), and PC via Steam, the developer announced. The opening movie was also released.

The Switch 2 version of Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter will be a digital-only release worldwide, with “no plans” to release a physical edition. It will offer a higher resolution and frame rate, as well as faster load times compared to the Switch version. Users who purchase the Switch version in either physical or digital format will be able to upgrade to the Switch 2 version by purchasing the “Upgrade Pack” for $1.00 / 150 yen. To play the Switch 2 version, you must purchase the Switch version and the “Upgrade Pack.”

Here is an overview of the demo:

This is a free demo version of Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter, a remake of the iconic first chapter of the Trails series that redefined the JRPG genre and set the Trails series on its legendary path!

In the demo version, players can experience the Prologue of the story. Any save data can be carried over to the full version of the game to continue the journey. (Some specifications from the demo may differ from the final version.)

Join Estelle Bright and her adoptive brother, Joshua, as they set out on their path as bracers, taking on tasks across the Rolent region in their father Cassius’ absence. When strange events begin to unfold on their quest to rise through the ranks of the Bracer Guild, they must quickly prove their worth in this gripping adventure of intrigue and peril.

Lose yourself in the beginning of this unforgettable 1st adventure in this trial version!

  • Start training to become a senior bracer in the Liberl Kingdom.
    • Travel through the Rolent region.
    • Play as Estelle, Joshua, and Scherazard.
    • The demo will culminate in an exhilarating boss fight
  • Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted world.
    • Fight your way through the first four dungeons.
    • Complete the first seven main events and eight optional sub quests.
    • Encounter NPCs with unique dialogue and additional quests.
  • Command intuitive, fast-paced battles.
    • Switch between real-time and turn-based combat to seamlessly fight foes.
    • Unlock chain and follow-up attacks
  • Experience modern gameplay mechanics.
    • Brand new voice-overs in English and Japanese.
    • Vivid, high definition 3D graphics.

(To carry over your demo save data, make sure to update to the latest version of the full game.)

Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on September 19 worldwide. Read more about the game here, here, here, here, here, here, and here.

Watch the opening movie below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.
